## TileKey.columnsAtLevel() method

Returns the number of available columns at a given level.

This is 2 to the power of the level.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static columnsAtLevel(level: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  level | number | The level for which to return the number of columns. |

<b>Returns:</b>

number

The available columns at the given level.
